about_the_game:
Dive into an enchanting world of adventure and discovery! In this exciting space horse-collecting game, players explore detailed, colorful illustrated landscapes in search of hidden items, interactive elements, and minigames. Discover puzzles, find food, and embark on a quest to bring your new equine friends home. Start your journey and see how many unique horses you can add to your collection!

Features:

  • Exploration: Find and solve puzzles in three wildly different biomes on this alien planet, as well as a smaller location around your Home.

  • Puzzles: Click around and read clues to find items, enter minigames and collect horses.

  • Minigames such as:

    • Fishing

    • Musical gauntlet

  • Renewable Food Sources: Click various objects to collect food for your horses.

  • Alien Horse Stables: Interact with, move and feed the horses you collected in your Stables.

  • Story Elements: Learn about the planet by reading descriptions of curious objects.

Credits:

Made by SpaceVibes!

Anna "Charlie" Rosputnia: Product Owner (Tech), Programmer, Background Artist

Isabelle Grunewald: Product Owner (Art), Horse Artist

Flavio Florovits: Programmer, Q/A, Publisher

Mikhail Trubnikov: Designer, Implementation, Business

Stephen Obiri-Ibe: Audio, Narrative, Business

Alina Bobysheva: 2D Artist, Scrum Master, Producer & Publisher

name: Stellar Stables

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated GPU
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: In Stellar Stables, you are an intergalactic alien-horse farmer, making your way through point and click puzzles and intriguing mini games to obtain horses and food for them. Watch as your Horse Happiness Meter grows and your stables fill up with all kinds of unique and lovable creatures!
